data.title: TUNE CONTEST — Cole Porter Festival
data.meta_description: Cole's Cover-Tune Contest 2024!  Local & regional bands perform Cole Porter classics in their own unique style. $1000 Grand Prize!
data.text:
If you are interested in applying to compete in the 2025 Festival Contest, read the info below and apply using the Submission Form provided.

No entry fees required to participate.

Seeking all types of music groups. Limited slots available.

CONTEST DATE:

SATURDAY JUNE 14th 2025 (EVENING)

HOW IT WORKS: Participating bands perform two (2) original/cover songs as a warm-up, followed by one (1) song written and composed by legendary Peru-born songwriter Cole Porter.

Cover versions of Cole Porter songs should be faithful to the original lyrics, melody & structure of Cole's work, re-imagined in your band’s own unique style.

Competing acts will be judged by an un-biased panel of judges, based on the Cole Porter song of their set. Winning acts announced and prizes awarded at the end of the event.

Prizes awarded based on how effectively bands integrate their own unique sound/style with the songwriting of Cole Porter. Creativity, musicianship and professionalism are considered.

Limited slots available for this event. Bands interested in participating are asked to submit a sample of recent live performance work. Bands should consist of three (3) or more members.

This is an outdoor event on a professional covered mobile stage.

Stage, lighting, drum kit, keyboard, PA, guitar amps & bass amps, and soundboard technician provided by producers. However, you are not required to use our backline instrument gear.

Beer & wine, non-alcohol drinks & food will be available for purchase during the event. 21+ only in bar area.

Is your band interested in participating? Contact the Cole Porter Festival production team:

call 765-469-4940 or email Hello@ColePorterFestival.org
